alert.note: Alert for Clark County Lowlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 13 at 2:15AM PDT until August 14 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 667... The National Weather Service in Portland has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT Monday. * AFFECTED AREA...In Washington, Fire Weather Zone 667 Clark County Lowlands. * WINDS...North to northeast winds 10 to 15 mph, with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
